name: SpaceBoy (ALPHARavenGamer)
description:
This game was made for a school project. In 3 weeks we needed to create a full shoot em up game. Due to the exercise there were some restrictions (Listed at the bottom of the discription).

===============================================================

Controls ShootingSpaceBar - Left mouse button (Gun 1: Hold to shoot. Gun 2: Tap to shoot hold and release for bigger bullet.)Switching weaponsLeft shiftMovingW A S D, Arrow keys

===============================================================

Asset Credits

Music

  • Main theme: Bensound -  Sci-Fi
  • Menu theme:  Aviators - Artificial Serenity

Models

  • Luuk S.

UI/Sprites

  • Aiyden J.
Rules and Restrictions for the project:
  • The game can start restart and end by failure and win. 
  • The player has to be a vihicle
  • The game contains 3 normal enemies and 1 boss.
  • The game is fully 3D except for the UI.
  • The main menu screen only contains existing game assets for the background.

The game must not contain:

  •  A settings menu .
  • Animations.
  • A tutorial or characters.
